review: Works fine. I especially like the voice selection speaker. Saves an amazing amount of time when searching for movies.
author: Stan Daley

review: first time user of the Amazon fire stick. So far I'm totally impressed with it! Highly recommended.
author: Jeff kellogg

review: Love the fire stick. Now need to get more for each tv
author: Will Charboneau

review: A gem. My Mother in Law has a god awful cable lineup but who cares when I can just plug in the Fire TV Stick.
author: Edward Chapman

review: Ok for the price! But if you're looking for something that performs a little better you have to go for the fire tv.
author: Nunoboxe

review: Canceled DirecTV because of this awesome little TV tool. Love it!!!!!
author: Bradley Sullivan

review: Didn't expect that it would differ from my Kindle. The Kindle allows apps like Disney Junior to play without a cable provider, fire stick does not. It's also a pain to add apps and then go to a website to activate them and then realize you again need to have a cable provider. We got Fire Stick and Chromecast because we don't want to pay for ridiculously high priced cable.
author: buckmm

review: Easy to set up and very user friendly. We now have access to everything in one place.
author: suzanne
